subject: Automobile Racing
Daytona 500 (Auto Race)
lead_paragraph: Hendrick Motorsports’ off-season changes, intended to reverse Dale Earnhardt Jr.’s slide, seemed to pay off right away in qualifying for the Nascar Sprint Cup season opener.
snippet: Hendrick Motorsports’ off-season changes, intended to reverse Dale Earnhardt Jr.’s slide, seemed to pay off right away in qualifying for the Nascar Sprint Cup season opener.
